GetCount.name: GetCount
GetCount.description: Returns a value that represents the number of objects in the collection.

GetItem.name: GetItem
GetItem.description: Returns a single object from a collection by its ID.

GetParent.name: GetParent
GetParent.description: Returns the parent object for the specified collection.
